author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Domain Holdings Australia Says HY ‍Pro Forma Net Profit After Tax $24.7 Mln​
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - Domain Holdings Australia Ltd:
* HY ‍PRO FORMA NET PROFIT AFTER TAX OF $24.7 MILLION, DOWN 8.1 PERCENT
* HY PRO FORMA REVENUE $183.3 MILLION, UP 12.5 PERCENT * ‍INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 4 CPS​ * ‍FOR FY18, DOMAIN‘S PRO FORMA COSTS ARE EXPECTED TO INCREASE AROUND 12 PERCENT TO 13 PERCENT FROM FY17​
* HY ‍STATUTORY NET LOSS AFTER TAX OF $3.4 MILLION​ * ALL FIGURES IN A$‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
